articles.title: Binary Search
articles.description: Learn how binary search efficiently finds elements in sorted arrays with O(log n) time complexity.

articles.title: Linear Search
articles.description: Learn how linear search works by stepping through each element in an array to find a target value

articles.title: Bubble Sort
articles.description: Interactive visualization of the bubble sort algorithm with step-by-step narration and animation controls

articles.title: KMP Algorithm
articles.description: Interactive visualization of the Knuth-Morris-Pratt string matching algorithm with LPS array construction and step-by-step execution.

articles.title: Insertion Sort Algorithm
articles.description: Interactive visualization of the insertion sort algorithm with step-by-step animations and voice-guided explanations

articles.title: Merge Sort Algorithm
articles.description: Interactive visualization of the divide-and-conquer merge sort algorithm with O(n log n) complexity
